roleset.name: divide into paragraphs
roleset.note: PARAGRAPH-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet or framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from paragraph.01-v)

roleset.name: write paragraphs
roleset.note: PARAGRAPH-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet or framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from paragraph.02-v)

example.name: Arg 1 first
example.text: All her friends were paragraphed in last Monday's paper.

example.name: Arg 0 first
example.text: This principle also works for [PRO] paragraphing a delicate, complex matter.
